activities: ExamBuilder uses personal information that it receives from the EU for processing information relating to the identification, evaluation, performance and training of our customers' employees. We host software on our servers and provide web-based software in the area of training and online assessment.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner for unresolved HR data issues relating to transfers from the EU to the USA or arbitration through the JAMS for unresolved personal (non-HR) data issues relating to transfers from the EU or Switzerland to the USA.
